name: From the Deep
description:
PRESENTATION


This is a 2D RPG in the style of Vagrant Hearts and Black Home.

A warrior finds himself on the darkest of the dungeons. He does not know how or why he came to be there. He does not know how to get out of it.
With some guidance, he will soon learn that the only way out, is through. To conquer his freedom, he will have his fears challenged, his will tested, and his courage tried.

FEATURES

  • A different design from what is usually expected from JRPGs
  • A narrative delivered in a very subtle, symbolic way
  • The story is a metaphor for life itself
